context: Good. Tell me three of your favorite movies
Okay. . . I like Thor: Ragnarok (2017) The Avengers (2012) and Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018)
Have you seen Deadpool (2016) or Never Let Me Go (2010)
I have seen Deadpool, but never heard of Never Let Me Go. Is it good?
I really liked Never Let Me Go (2010) it's kinda of sci-fi flick. I also really liked The Shape of Water (2017)
The Shape of Water was enjoyable Thanks for the recommendations.
resp: Seen The Other Woman (2014) or Lars and the Real Girl (2007)
